categories: Category:Imperial II-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Unidentified Imperial II-class Star Destroyer  (Gall, dayside)

An Imperial II-class Star Destroyer of the Galactic Empire protected the dayside orbit of the Imperial-held moon of Gall during the Galactic Civil War. Along with a secondary Star Destroyer patrolling Gall's nightside orbit, this Star Destroyer defended the moon against a Rebel Alliance attack in 3.5 ABY.
